name: STELLABITS
description:
It is a puzzle game that aims to clear levels by capturing various gimmicks while operating 4 characters.
At first, the level is very simple, but gradually the types of characters and gimmicks that can be controlled increase.
Each character has different performance, and the key is which character to move in which scene.
Collect all the stars in the field to clear the level, and clear a certain number of levels to advance to the next area.
